text: main ( ) { int t , i , j , rows , mat [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , sum , large , p , k ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < t ; k ++ ) { sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & rows ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < rows ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & mat [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } for ( i = rows - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { large = mat [ i ] [ 0 ] ; p = 0 ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( i == rows - 1 ) { if ( large < mat [ i ] [ j ] ) { large = mat [ i ] [ j ] ; p = j ; } } else { if ( large < mat [ i ] [ j ] && ( j == p || j == p - 1 ) ) { large = mat [ i ] [ j ] ; p = j ; } } } sum += large ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
